```scss

// Description: The effect you provide for the view.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.iOS.BlurView

'.effect-blur-style-system-material': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_MATERIAL }
'.effect-blur-style-system-thick-material': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_THICK_MATERIAL }

'.effect-blur-style-system-material-light': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_MATERIAL_LIGHT }
'.effect-blur-style-system-thick-material-light': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_THICK_MATERIAL_LIGHT }
```
